call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - March 27th

commitments.commitment: Propose voting for 6.0 starting from early May
commitments.quote: I think we can think about proposing a voting starting from early May

commitments.commitment: Do another release candidate version release this week
commitments.quote: this week I will do another release candidate, version release

commitments.commitment: Send demurrage information and materials to DX pool operator
commitments.quote: I'll totally like when I get a moment, I'll send some of that information over

commitments.commitment: Make mining pool dashboard quicker and faster
commitments.quote: I'm making it a point now to make it think definitely is it needs it'll be a lot quicker and faster

commitments.commitment: Reach out to qx() about node update for demurrage relative to 6.0

open_questions.question: Different monetization strategies for Sigmanauts mining pool
How to reward miners in sub-blocks implementation for Bitcoin forks
open_questions.context: Discussion about implementing sub-blocks in other chains

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool has consistent 100 gigahash
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Pool had 150 gigahash for one day with someone adding 40-50 gigahash
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Demurrage collection was 170 ERG over two weeks
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Block reward is currently around 15 ERG (about to hit 15)
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: HQ3rr's child is three months old
key_facts.speaker: HQ3rr

key_facts.fact: Current testnet version is 6.0 R2, with 6.0 R3 available
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: RC4 will be quite different from RC3
key_facts.speaker: kushti
